entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries later this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 21 with temperature rising to minus 16 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21 with temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023
